response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $15,000 to you and represents a considerable investment for me. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this product at an exclusive price of $14,500. This offer not only saves you $500 but also ensures you receive the best possible deal. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to benefit from the product's value while enjoying a favorable discount. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
